com.hermes

Class Consumer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hermes.Consumer

  • public class Consumer
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Consumer(java.lang.String zkUrl, java.lang.String channelName, java.lang.String groupName, Receiver receiver)
      Creates a new consumer to receive messages from Hermes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Consumer

        public Consumer(java.lang.String zkUrl,
                java.lang.String channelName,
                java.lang.String groupName,
                Receiver receiver)
        Creates a new consumer to receive messages from Hermes.
        Parameters:
        zkUrl - The ZooKeeper URL (or comma separated URLs) of the ZooKeeper node(s).
        channelName - The name of the channel to receive messages from.
        groupName - The consumer group this consumer belongs to. A message is broadcast to each consumer group, but only one consumer within each group will receive it (load balanced).
        receiver - The interface containing logic to handle received messages.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts the consumer. This method must be called before messages can be received.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Shuts down this consumer.
